node.excerpt: A common challenge while building apps is setting up authentication. In this video, Jason Lengstorf and Ado Kukic build a Gatsby app using Auth0 to create a login-protected dashboard.

frontmatter.title: Add Authentication to Your Gatsby Apps With Auth0 (Livestream)
